text: e- fore the pandemic outbreak. See, for instance, the references re- garding each parameter listed in Table 2. The evolution of GDP is illustrated in Fig. 4. The GDP indicates a recession chart where the population ( A 1) and government ( A 4) is losing wealth and the businesses ( A 3) are floating at the equi- librium point (when the incomes and expenses are equal).
